html: Thank you to everyone who came to the town hall today. We live in the best country in the world and we’re all Americans first. We should always be civil in our dialogue and debates, and remember to always respect each other. I look forward to more of these in the future.
text: Thank you to everyone who came to the town hall today. We live in the best country in the world and we’re all Americans first. We should always be civil in our dialogue and debates, and remember to always respect each other. I look forward to more of these in the future.

html: On school violence, I have supported 4 bills to improve mental health programs, law enforcement fusion centers, deterring straw purchase of guns used illegally, and funding for school resources officers.
text: On school violence, I have supported 4 bills to improve mental health programs, law enforcement fusion centers, deterring straw purchase of guns used illegally, and funding for school resources officers.

html: Our economy is the best it’s been in 49 years and unemployment is at an all time low. We have more job openings than people trying to fill them. GDP growth is higher than projected since the passage of Tax Reform.
text: Our economy is the best it’s been in 49 years and unemployment is at an all time low. We have more job openings than people trying to fill them. GDP growth is higher than projected since the passage of Tax Reform.

html: #1 topic we hear about is immigration. I voted twice for comprehensive reforms to protect our border, hire more judges, implement e-verify and provide a pathway for DACA. TPS is critical to NE Ag. Many have been here for 20+ yrs, are law abiding, pay taxes and deserve to stay.
text: #1 topic we hear about is immigration. I voted twice for comprehensive reforms to protect our border, hire more judges, implement e-verify and provide a pathway for DACA. TPS is critical to NE Ag. Many have been here for 20+ yrs, are law abiding, pay taxes and deserve to stay.

html: I was the lead advocate to include wind energy in the tax reform. As a result, Omaha energy’s source is 35-40%. I also support solar, geothermal and battery storage research.
text: I was the lead advocate to include wind energy in the tax reform. As a result, Omaha energy’s source is 35-40%. I also support solar, geothermal and battery storage research.

html: We must protect religious freedoms. SCOTUS Kennedy in his majority opinion said “the 1st Amendment ensures that religious orgs and persons are given proper protection as they seek to teach the principles that are so fulfilling and so central to their lives and faiths.”

html: NEW: As of about 3:30 p.m., @UnionPacific started to transport evacuees from Waterloo to Elkhorn Middle School via high-rail vehicles on UP's tracks. The shelter is secured by @OmahaPolice & open to evacuees only. Several services on-site for evacuees. #flood2019 #NebraskaFlood
text:
NEW: As of about 3:30 p.m., @UnionPacific started to transport evacuees from Waterloo to Elkhorn Middle School via high-rail vehicles on UP's tracks. 
The shelter is secured by @OmahaPolice & open to evacuees only. Several services on-site for evacuees. #flood2019 #NebraskaFlood

html: Our military readiness levels when I came to Congress in 2017 were the worst since 1977. That is unacceptable, but I am encouraged by the last two defense bills. We are digging ourselves out of this hole, but it will not happen overnight.
text: Our military readiness levels when I came to Congress in 2017 were the worst since 1977. That is unacceptable, but I am encouraged by the last two defense bills. We are digging ourselves out of this hole, but it will not happen overnight.

html: As a nation, we just passed over $22 trillion in debt. We don't have a revenue problem, we have a spending problem. We cannot ignore this any longer.
text: As a nation, we just passed over $22 trillion in debt. We don't have a revenue problem, we have a spending problem. We cannot ignore this any longer.

html: Prescription drug pricing is an issue with bipartisan support to fix. We must fix this now and lower costs.
text: Prescription drug pricing is an issue with bipartisan support to fix. We must fix this now and lower costs.

html: One of the most critical issues we must address is health care. We need to lower costs, protect those with pre-existing conditions, and target taxpayer money to go where it can be most effective.
text: One of the most critical issues we must address is health care. We need to lower costs, protect those with pre-existing conditions, and target taxpayer money to go where it can be most effective.

html: We need to secure our border. Border security is national security.
text: We need to secure our border. Border security is national security.

html: I voted on two bills last summer that would have funded a targeted wall, and address a plan forward for DACA. There has to be some give and take from both sides to advance on this issue for our country.
text: I voted on two bills last summer that would have funded a targeted wall, and address a plan forward for DACA. There has to be some give and take from both sides to advance on this issue for our country.

html: The statements from the VA Governor about abortion were terrible. We are 1 of 7 countries in the world that allow abortions past 20 weeks. I am a cosponsor of the Pain Capable Unborn Child Protection Act to change this.
text: The statements from the VA Governor about abortion were terrible. We are 1 of 7 countries in the world that allow abortions past 20 weeks. I am a cosponsor of the Pain Capable Unborn Child Protection Act to change this.

html: We need more Holocaust education to combat anti-semitism, and I am committed to furthering Holocaust education in our country.
text: We need more Holocaust education to combat anti-semitism, and I am committed to furthering Holocaust education in our country.

html: Anti-Semitism is increasing. We have to be honest about it, that it comes from the right and left. This is unacceptable and repugnant and there is no tolerance for it.
text: Anti-Semitism is increasing. We have to be honest about it, that it comes from the right and left. This is unacceptable and repugnant and there is no tolerance for it.

html: Of all the issues we work with in Congress, veterans issues have the most bipartisan support.
text: Of all the issues we work with in Congress, veterans issues have the most bipartisan support.

html: A shutdown is a sign of a non-functioning government. We have to do better.
text: A shutdown is a sign of a non-functioning government. We have to do better.

html: Great news for NE as the Air Force has committed to replacing the entire Offutt runway. I was glad to work with the NE delegation on this.
text: Great news for NE as the Air Force has committed to replacing the entire Offutt runway. I was glad to work with the NE delegation on this.

html: Was able to participate in an F-35 flight simulator yesterday. The capabilities the F-35 has are needed as our enemies' weapon systems advance, and our other planes age. We cannot afford to lose our edge in aircraft technology.pic.twitter.com/u1hjgGTacd

html: 1 out of every 4 jobs in Nebraska is related to ag and the 2018 Farm Bill provides certainty not only to our farmers, ranchers and producers, but to so many other related industries. There are many wins for Nebraska in this bill. Read my statement here:https://bit.ly/2rwzrGK
text: 1 out of every 4 jobs in Nebraska is related to ag and the 2018 Farm Bill provides certainty not only to our farmers, ranchers and producers, but to so many other related industries. There are many wins for Nebraska in this bill. Read my statement here:https://bit.ly/2rwzrGK

html: I am committed to supporting the 2018 Farm Bill. It is budget neutral, improves SNAP work requirements, has affordable crop insurance, maintains in-kind food aid, & establishes a Foot-and-Mouth Disease Vaccine Bank – an effort I helped lead. https://bit.ly/2Qxd17y
text: I am committed to supporting the 2018 Farm Bill. It is budget neutral, improves SNAP work requirements, has affordable crop insurance, maintains in-kind food aid, & establishes a Foot-and-Mouth Disease Vaccine Bank – an effort I helped lead. https://bit.ly/2Qxd17y
